solution_line_template: Twice as many flyers as Maisie is {maisie_flyers} * {multiplier_for_twice} = <<{maisie_flyers}*{multiplier_for_twice}={twice_maisie_flyers}>>{twice_maisie_flyers} flyers.
Donna dropped off five more than that, so she dropped off {twice_maisie_flyers} + {five_more} = <<{twice_maisie_flyers}+{five_more}={donna_flyers}>>{donna_flyers} flyers.
